plugins.name: Text Transfer
plugins.description: It is often necessary to copy and past text into certain elements in the design. I couldn't find a plugin that allows this to be done quickly and easily, so I decided to create one. It enables you to select multiple elements, copy the text, and paste him into other elements one by one.
plugins.tagline: The plugin allows you to quickly copy text from one element and paste it into another.

plugins.name: Sense Injector
plugins.description:
1.Scan a component instance

2.Create a snapshot of its properties

3.Paste snapshot properties into other instances of the same component


Works well with nested components, enabling property injection deep into component structures.


All captured properties are stored as an editable JSON structure.

plugins.name: Hoot Spotter
plugins.description: Hoot Spotter helps you catch visual inconsistencies before they fly under the radar. Choose a Control (such as your design system pattern), then select a Reference (your new design), and we’ll show you what aligns and what needs fixing. From color mismatches to rogue corners, Hoot Spotter makes compliance simple, fast, and visual. Perfect for design system maintainers and teams looking to stay aligned without slowing down.
plugins.tagline: Scan components for visual consistency with your design system. 🦉

plugins.name: Random Rectangle Maker
plugins.description:
This plugin was made for testing purposes to test the cursor AI. I used Cursor AI to write the code and ChatGPT to help design the cover and icon. It’s a quick example of how fun and fast building with AI tools can be.


With one click, the plugin adds a rectangle to your canvas. Each rectangle shows up in a random spot with a random bright color.


→ Made with the help of Cursor AI for coding

→ Visuals created with ChatGPT

→ Quick, simple, and fun to use

→ A small tool for creative ideas


I really enjoy working where design and code come together. If you’re building something creative like a design tool, plugin, or even a storytelling project, I’d love to connect.


Reach out anytime: hey@abdulwahab.design

Or connect on LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/heyabdulwahab/

accepted.name: Abdul Wahab
accepted.description:
Senior Visual Design Analyst at Accenture Song
— — — 
I blend creativity and technical background to design beautiful efficient interfaces and experiences ◡̈

plugins.name: Zeytal Variables Extractor
plugins.description:
Zeytal helps developers extract and optimize SVGs, transform Figma styles and variables, and generate TailwindCSS config files effortlessly.


This plugin helps Zeytal users leverage their Figma variables.


Zeytal Features

  1. Extract and optimize SVGs
  2. Extract and convert Figma variables to .ts, .js, .json, .css, .scss, .sass, and .less files
  3. Extract and convert Figma styles to .ts, .js, .json, .css, .scss, .sass, and .less files
  4. Convert Figma styles and variables to TailwindCSS v4 config files.


This Plugin

This plugin helps Figma users prepare their Figma files for Figma variables extraction and code generation.


How it works :

  1. Start the plugin.
  2. Click on one button to export your Figma variables to Zeytal
  3. Use Zeytal CLI to generate your code and config files


Everything is explained in detail in Zeytal documentation.
plugins.tagline: From Figma to Code In One Command Line

133510.description:

  3. Extract and convert Figma styles to .ts, .js, .json, .css, .scss, .sass, and .less files
  4. Convert Figma styles and variables to TailwindCSS v4 config files.

plugins.name: push-my-icons
plugins.description:
Push your Figma SVG icons to GitHub with ease.


This plugin helps you

  1. Automatically extract SVG nodes
  2. Upload them to your GitHub repository
  3. Generate a pull request with added/updated/removed icons


How to Use

  1. Open the plugin and fill in the following fields:
  2. GitHub personal access token
  3. GitHub repository URL
  4. Target folder path in the repo (e.g., src/icons)
  5. Pull request title and description
  6. Select all frames that contain your SVG icon components.
  7. Each selected frame should be a top-level container for one or more SVGs.
  8. Click "Push" button.
  9. The plugin will:
  10. Export all SVGs found in the selected frames
  11. Upload them to the specified folder in your GitHub repo
  12. Create a pull request containing added, updated, or deleted icon files
plugins.tagline: Push selected Figma icons to GitHub in one click.

134542.tagline: Push selected Figma icons to GitHub in one click.

plugins.name: FigJam Sticky Color Picker
plugins.description:
This is a plugin for setting the color of Sticky:

  1. Directly set the fill color of the Sticky.
  2. It is also able to set the color of the text within the Sticky.
  3. You can set the color for a single Sticky node, or for multiple selected Sticky nodes. Even more, you can directly select an area, and the plugin will automatically identify the Sticky nodes within the selected area and change their colors as well as the colors of the text.
plugins.tagline: Custom the color of sticky and sticky text

plugins.name: AI Brand Guide
plugins.description:
AI Brand Guide transforms your design files into comprehensive, professional brand guides in seconds. Extract and organize design elements from your Figma files to create beautiful, developer-friendly documentation.


Key Features

  1. Intelligent Design Element Categorization: Automatically organizes your elements into Buttons, Icons, and Other Elements based on naming patterns
  2. Multi-Frame Export: Choose between Single Frame (all sections in one scrollable frame) or Separate Frames (each section in its own dedicated frame)
  3. Color Palette Extraction: Automatically extracts colors from your selection with detailed RGB, HEX, and HSL values
  4. AI-Powered Color Naming: Generate professional, creative names for your color palette with a single click
  5. Color Theory Generation: Create comprehensive color theory documentation including palette overview, color roles, visual qualities, and usage recommendations
  6. Typography Hierarchy System: Extracts and organizes typography into a structured system with Header and Paragraph classifications
  7. Component Documentation: Displays detailed specifications for buttons, icons and other elements including exact dimensions and padding values
  8. Visual Previews: Generates thumbnail previews for all design elements
  9. Form Element Detection: Special handling for contact forms and other form elements with improved display


How It Works

  1. Select your design elements in Figma (frames, components, or entire pages)
  2. Generate your brand guide with a single click
  3. Customize your guide: Rename colors, add color theory, or organize elements
  4. Export to Figma: Choose your preferred layout style and generate a complete brand guide directly in your Figma file


Element Categorization

For best results, use these naming patterns:

  1. Buttons: Include "btn" or "button" in the name (e.g., "btn-primary", "submit-button")
  2. Icons: Include "icn" or "icon" in the name (e.g., "icn-home", "arrow-icon")
  3. Other Elements: Include "element" or "other" in the name (e.g., "card-element", "other-banner")


What's Included in Your Brand Guide

  1. Color Palette: Complete color documentation with visual swatches and color codes
  2. Typography System: Organized type hierarchy with font details and visual examples
  3. Buttons Collection: All button variants with exact dimensions and padding specifications
  4. Icon Library: Organized icon set with dimensions and specifications
  5. Additional Elements: Cards, banners, forms and other UI components with detailed measurements
  6. Color Theory: Optional section providing insights on palette psychology, symbolism and usage


AI Brand Guide helps design teams maintain consistency while giving developers the exact specifications they need to implement designs accurately.
plugins.tagline: Transform designs into comprehensive brand guides with AI-powered color intelligence.

plugins.name: 图表库 Chart Master
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows designers to quickly insert predefined design frames into their projects with just a click. It simplifies the process of applying consistent styles, layouts, and content, enhancing productivity and design consistency.


Features Introduction

•Insert predefined design frames with a single click.

•Automatically apply layout settings and styles to frames.

•Supports multiple language interfaces (English, Chinese, etc.).

•Real-time error notifications and fallbacks for seamless user experience.


How to Use

1.Open the Figma plugin and choose your desired design frame.

2.Click the insert button to add the frame to your design.

3.Customize the frame as needed—styles and layouts are already applied.

4.Switch languages via the plugin settings if required.


Notes

•Ensure all necessary fonts are installed to avoid fallback issues.

•If errors occur, check the console for detailed messages.

•Language settings can be changed anytime through the plugin interface.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件让设计师可以轻松地在项目中插入预定义的设计框架。通过简化应用一致的样式、布局和内容的过程，插件提高了生产力和设计一致性。


功能说明

•一键插入预定义的设计框架。

•自动应用框架的布局设置和样式。

•支持多语言界面（英语、中文等）。

•实时错误通知和回退功能，确保无缝用户体验。


使用方法

1.打开 Figma 插件，选择您需要的设计框架。

2.点击插入按钮，将框架添加到您的设计中。

3.根据需要自定义框架—样式和布局已自动应用。

4.如果需要，通过插件设置切换语言。


注意事项

•确保已安装所有必要的字体，以避免回退问题。

•如果发生错误，请检查控制台获取详细信息。

•可以随时通过插件界面更改语言设置。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Effortlessly Insert and Style Design Frames with a Click

136384.description:

plugins.name: WCAG 色彩对比检查 WCAG Color Checker
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin helps you evaluate the contrast ratio between text and background colors in your design frames, ensuring they meet WCAG accessibility standards. Perfect for designers aiming to improve readability and accessibility.


Function Introduction

•Check text-background contrast ratio within selected frames.

•Evaluate contrast according to WCAG standards (AAA, AA, A, Fail).

•Visualize contrast results and interact with your design directly.

•Automatic identification and highlighting of areas needing improvement.


Usage

1.Select a frame in your Figma file.

2.Run the plugin and click “Check Contrast.”

3.Review the results, which are sorted by contrast ratio.

4.Click on any result to highlight and improve specific text elements.


Notes

•Ensure text layers are properly named for better result identification.

•The plugin currently supports checking text against solid color backgrounds only.

•For best results, use the plugin on well-structured design frames.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件帮助您评估设计画板中文本与背景颜色之间的对比度，以确保其符合 WCAG 无障碍设计标准。非常适合希望提升可读性和无障碍性的设计师。


功能说明

•检查选定画板中文本与背景的对比度。

•根据 WCAG 标准评估对比度（AAA、AA、A、Fail）。

•可视化对比度结果并直接与设计交互。

•自动识别和突出显示需要改进的区域。


使用方法

1.在 Figma 文件中选择一个画板。

2.运行插件并点击“检查对比度”。

3.查看按对比度排序的结果。

4.点击任一结果以突出并改进特定的文本元素。


注意事项

•确保文本图层正确命名，以便更好地识别结果。

•插件目前仅支持检查与纯色背景的文本对比。

•为获得最佳效果，请在结构良好的设计画板上使用插件。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Quickly check and improve contrast ratios in Figma frames with one click.

136507.name: WCAG 色彩对比检查 WCAG Color Checker
136507.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin helps you evaluate the contrast ratio between text and background colors in your design frames, ensuring they meet WCAG accessibility standards. Perfect for designers aiming to improve readability and accessibility.


Function Introduction

•Check text-background contrast ratio within selected frames.

•Evaluate contrast according to WCAG standards (AAA, AA, A, Fail).

•Visualize contrast results and interact with your design directly.

•Automatic identification and highlighting of areas needing improvement.


Usage

1.Select a frame in your Figma file.

2.Run the plugin and click “Check Contrast.”

3.Review the results, which are sorted by contrast ratio.

4.Click on any result to highlight and improve specific text elements.


Notes

•Ensure text layers are properly named for better result identification.

•The plugin currently supports checking text against solid color backgrounds only.

•For best results, use the plugin on well-structured design frames.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件帮助您评估设计画板中文本与背景颜色之间的对比度，以确保其符合 WCAG 无障碍设计标准。非常适合希望提升可读性和无障碍性的设计师。


功能说明

•检查选定画板中文本与背景的对比度。

•根据 WCAG 标准评估对比度（AAA、AA、A、Fail）。

•可视化对比度结果并直接与设计交互。

•自动识别和突出显示需要改进的区域。


使用方法

1.在 Figma 文件中选择一个画板。

2.运行插件并点击“检查对比度”。

3.查看按对比度排序的结果。

4.点击任一结果以突出并改进特定的文本元素。


注意事项

•确保文本图层正确命名，以便更好地识别结果。

•插件目前仅支持检查与纯色背景的文本对比。

•为获得最佳效果，请在结构良好的设计画板上使用插件。

manifest.name: WCAG 色彩对比检查 WCAG Color Checker

136507.tagline: Quickly check and improve contrast ratios in Figma frames with one click.

plugins.name: Annotate Flow
plugins.description:
Annotate Flow allows you to quickly and conveniently add numbered markers and text comments to any objects in Figma. Ideal for:

  1. conducting reviews,
  2. creating guides,
  3. visually explaining interface elements.


Functionality:

  1. A marker with a number automatically appears next to the selected object.
  2. The comment is placed separately outside the frame and does not fall inside the UI layers.
  3. Ability to choose the background and text color for annotations.
  4. Font size selector for comment text.
  5. “Reset Counter” button to start annotations from 1.
  6. Convenient and intuitive interface.


🧩 Works with any layers and components. No configuration required — just select an object and click “ADD ANNOTATION”.
plugins.tagline: Instantly create numbered markers and comments with color settings to annotate, explain any design.

137708.name: Annotate Flow
137708.description:

plugins.name: FigML - Figma XML Exporter Plugin
plugins.description:
FigML - Figma XML Exporter Plugin


Export your Figma designs to clean, structured XML. This lets you work with any programming language, any framework, and fit the code perfectly into your existing codebase. No tokens, no API calls, no headaches.


What You Get


🔍 Output That Actual Humans (and Robots) Can Read

- Preserves your Figma structure exactly as designed

- Strips away the noise: default properties and design-time clutter


🎮 Plays Nice With Everything

- Generate fresh components from scratch

- Update existing components when designs inevitably change

- Audit your component library against the latest design updates

- Create components that fit perfectly into your existing architecture

- Works with whatever you're using: React, SwiftUI, Flutter, WPF, Qt, shadcn/ui, DaisyUI, or that custom framework your team built


👑 You're the Boss

Feed the XML to any AI assistant (ChatGPT, Claude, Cursor, etc.) and get exactly the code you need. No cookie-cutter templates, no assumptions about how you like to work.


How It Works


1. Design in Figma (you're already doing this)

2. Click export (literally one click)

3. Ask your AI buddy to convert the XML

4. Ship it


Ready to stop fighting with design-to-code tools? Install FigML.

accepted.name: FigML
accepted.description: Export Figma design to XML. Simple. Clean. Powerful.

plugins.tagline: Export Figma design to XML. Simple. Clean. Powerful.

plugins.name: Rename by text list
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you rename multiple layers in bulk using a text-based list.

Simply select two Auto Layout frames:

  1. One containing the elements to rename (any layer type)
  2. One containing text nodes with the desired names

The plugin will rename each element in the first frame using the corresponding text content from the second frame, based on their order in the layers panel.
plugins.tagline: Rename one list of items by another list of text items

plugins.name: 液态玻璃生成器 Liquid Glass Generator
plugins.description:
介绍

Liquid Glass 是一款帮助设计师快速创建液态玻璃风格 UI 效果的 Figma 插件，可模拟现代界面中常见的毛玻璃、层叠光影等质感表现。


功能说明

•一键生成包含背景模糊、渐变描边和透明填充的液态玻璃容器

•支持调节透明度和模糊强度

•自动叠加纹理图层，增强真实感

•创建位置自动居中显示在当前视图中心


使用方法

1.在 Figma 插件菜单中运行 Liquid Glass

2.设置透明度和模糊参数

3.点击 Apply 按钮生成液态玻璃框

4.自动居中展示，可根据需要自由拖动或组合使用


注意事项

•推荐用于浅色或模糊背景下，视觉更佳

•可与其他 UI 元素组合使用增强表现力

•在复杂画布上运行时可能略有延迟


Introduction

Liquid Glass is a Figma plugin for designers who want to create realistic glassmorphism UI effects effortlessly. It simulates the layered, frosted, and glowing look commonly seen in modern interfaces.


Function Description

•Adds a liquid glass style frame with background blur, angular stroke, and gradient fills

•Includes configurable opacity and blur settings

•Adds optional layered texture for enhanced realism

•Automatically centers the effect on your current viewport


How to Use

1.Run the plugin from the Figma plugins menu

2.Adjust opacity and blur in the popup panel

3.Click “Apply” to generate a liquid glass frame

4.The generated element appears centered in your viewport


Notes

•Works best on light or blurred backgrounds

•You can group the frame with existing UI elements

•Performance may vary with complex canvases

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Create beautiful glassmorphism effects instantly

137590.name: 液态玻璃生成器 Liquid Glass Generator
137590.description:
介绍

Liquid Glass 是一款帮助设计师快速创建液态玻璃风格 UI 效果的 Figma 插件，可模拟现代界面中常见的毛玻璃、层叠光影等质感表现。


功能说明

•一键生成包含背景模糊、渐变描边和透明填充的液态玻璃容器

•支持调节透明度和模糊强度

•自动叠加纹理图层，增强真实感

•创建位置自动居中显示在当前视图中心


使用方法

1.在 Figma 插件菜单中运行 Liquid Glass

2.设置透明度和模糊参数

3.点击 Apply 按钮生成液态玻璃框

4.自动居中展示，可根据需要自由拖动或组合使用


注意事项

•推荐用于浅色或模糊背景下，视觉更佳

•可与其他 UI 元素组合使用增强表现力

•在复杂画布上运行时可能略有延迟


Introduction

Liquid Glass is a Figma plugin for designers who want to create realistic glassmorphism UI effects effortlessly. It simulates the layered, frosted, and glowing look commonly seen in modern interfaces.


Function Description

•Adds a liquid glass style frame with background blur, angular stroke, and gradient fills

•Includes configurable opacity and blur settings

•Adds optional layered texture for enhanced realism

•Automatically centers the effect on your current viewport


How to Use

1.Run the plugin from the Figma plugins menu

2.Adjust opacity and blur in the popup panel

3.Click “Apply” to generate a liquid glass frame

4.The generated element appears centered in your viewport


Notes

•Works best on light or blurred backgrounds

•You can group the frame with existing UI elements

•Performance may vary with complex canvases

manifest.name: 液态玻璃生成器 Liquid Glass Generator

137590.release_notes: Added real-time preview for parameter adjustments in the UI.

plugins.name: Pagify
plugins.description:
Pagify — Page Management Made Simple


This plugin simplifies page management in Figma with an intuitive interface for creating, organizing, and maintaining your project structure. Whether you're building complex design systems or managing multiple screens, Pagify streamlines page workflows so you can focus on design.


No more cluttered page panels or tedious manual work. Just drag, drop, and structure your pages with precision.


Key features:

  1. Create pages from existing elements
  2. Quick page renaming and deletion
  3. Separator pages for better organization
  4. Clean interface that stays out of your way
  5. Bulk operations for maximum efficiency

accepted.name: Pavel Grachev
accepted.description: Product designer with 5+ years of experience in web and mobile UI. Focused on clarity, usability, and quality design systems.

plugins.tagline: Streamline your Figma pages, neat, clear, efficient
